1.title: Deployable Devastation

episode of.title: GunnyTime with R. Lee Ermey (TV Series 2015– )

1.plot: The Gunny and Orbital ATK demonstrate the magnificent mounted and mobile firepower of the Stretched MK-44 Bushmaster chain gun, mounted on an LAV3. You'll be front and center to all the fury and deployable devastation of a host of badass projectiles that you've gotta see to believe.

2.title: How Swede It Is

episode of.title: GunnyTime with R. Lee Ermey (TV Series 2015– )

2.plot: The Gunny and his friends challenge the mighty mythic power of Thor with two superb Swedish-made weapons: The Swedish K and Kulspruta M36 Machine Guns. Watch as they drop the hammer and roll the thunder over the badlands of the Arizona desert.

3.title: Rendezvous with Rarity

episode of.title: GunnyTime with R. Lee Ermey (TV Series 2015– )

3.plot: The Gunny takes us back to World War II on a world tour of military metal. First up, something rare, fabulous, and French; The FM24/29 Light Machine Gun; Then we've got something special from the land down under, Australia, the Owen Submachine gun.

4.title: Unchain My Heart

episode of.title: GunnyTime with R. Lee Ermey (TV Series 2015– )

4.plot: The Gunny gets his hands on the M230 Bushmaster chain gun by Orbital ATK, mounted on an LC79 and a couple of Oshkosh JLTVs. They're breaking out the ammo crates to demonstrate how this badass auto-cannon has become a standard of modern military warfare and a sublime spectacle of engineered awesome.

5.title: Rare Russian to Mass Production

episode of.title: GunnyTime with R. Lee Ermey (TV Series 2015– )

5.plot: The Gunny goes arm and arm with the Russian PPS 43 sub-machine gun and the American M1 and M2 Carbines. If necessity's the mother of invention, then get ready to meet the kids. It's The Gunny's version of Beauty and the Beast. Primed, loaded, locked and cocked.

6.title: JEEPers ReaPers

episode of.title: GunnyTime with R. Lee Ermey (TV Series 2015– )

6.plot: The Gunny grips and rips with some real veterans of the fight: the Russian RP46, and a dynamic duo of American mechanized military might-the M1919 A4 Browning machine gun mounted on a 1943 Ford GPW, aka-a soldier's best friend-the Jeep.

7.title: British Battle Beauties

episode of.title: GunnyTime with R. Lee Ermey (TV Series 2015– )

7.plot: The Gunny and friends play with a couple butt-kicking pieces of British firepower that are nothing short of gun royalty: the Webley-Fosbury Automatic Revolver, and the Bren light machine gun-two legends of the past century that put the great in Great Britain.

8.title: The Next Generation

episode of.title: GunnyTime with R. Lee Ermey (TV Series 2015– )

8.plot: The Gunny goes toe-to-toe with some killer robots, armed with two futuristic bullpups - the Tavor 21 and X95. Then The Gunny and Team GLOCK Captain, Shane Coley, get hands-on in the highly anticipated debut of GLOCK's Gen5 G17 and G19 pistols.

9.title: Mutant Monster Mayhem

episode of.title: GunnyTime with R. Lee Ermey (TV Series 2015– )

9.plot: The Gunny gets his first look at some next generation weapons that'll make your trigger finger mighty itchy: the FosTecH Origin-12 shotgun, and the MK-47 Mutant from CMMG. Make way for some man-made monster mayhem.

10.title: Myths and Muted Muzzles

episode of.title: GunnyTime with R. Lee Ermey (TV Series 2015– )

10.plot: The Gunny takes a deep-dive into the armory and emerges with antiquity and obscurity. First, a true icon of bygone days, a gun as famous in name as any in modern times-the Gatling Gun; and the, not so famous, DeLisle Carbine-a soft-spoken, rare and obscure weapon, that is as deadly as it is quiet.

1.title: S Marks the Spot

episode of.title: GunnyTime with R. Lee Ermey (TV Series 2015– )

1.plot: The Gunny and WWII weapons expert Gary Archer get together to talk and shoot British guns from WWII; then, former Navy Seal Craig "Sawman" Sawyer" introduces us to a new American classic battle carbine.

2.title: Size Doesn't Matter

episode of.title: GunnyTime with R. Lee Ermey (TV Series 2015– )

2.plot: The Gunny hangs with Trey and Brandon from Dillon Aero company to talk about (and tear it up with) one of his favorite guns, the Dillon Minigun; then, two-time USPSA National Champion Tori Nonaka swings by to run through a course of fire with the brand new GLOCK 43.

3.title: Tacticool Maneuvers

episode of.title: GunnyTime with R. Lee Ermey (TV Series 2015– )

3.plot: The Gunny talks shop with former Green Beret Grady Powell, then they show off the Black Rain Ordnance PG3. Later, Craig "Sawman" Sawyer swings by to pick up Gunny in a Tomcar M5 with a mounted M249 S.A.W., and the boys go off-road looking for stuff to shoot.

4.title: Tanks for Nothin'

episode of.title: GunnyTime with R. Lee Ermey (TV Series 2015– )

4.plot: The Gunny pays a visit to Marine Corps base Camp Pendleton to check in with the troops and check out the M72 LAW (Light Anti Armor Weapon). Then, the Gunny heads back out to the range with WWII weapons expert Gary Archer to check out the British-made Boys anti tank rifle.

5.title: Once Upon a Gunnytime in the West

episode of.title: GunnyTime with R. Lee Ermey (TV Series 2015– )

5.plot: The Gunny and Wild West expert Pistol Pete Sherayko dust off and get shooting with some hard-to-find weapons from the Wild Wild West. Then, trick shooter and YouTube sensation Kirsten Joy Weiss comes by to show off what she can do with a vintage Winchester Model 1873, the "Gun that won the West."

6.title: Russian to Conclusions

episode of.title: GunnyTime with R. Lee Ermey (TV Series 2015– )

6.plot: The Gunny shoots with Sergeant Theresa Vail US Army, and Miss Kansas 2013. They talk famous female snipers and pull the trigger on one of the Red Army's greatest historical rifles. Later, Gunny goes deeper into Russian machine gun lore and checks out the no nonsense RPD and PKM with former Special Forces and weapons expert Russ Cannon.

7.title: Down Range Devastation

episode of.title: GunnyTime with R. Lee Ermey (TV Series 2015– )

7.plot: The Gunny heads back to Camp Pendleton to rip through some rounds with the devastating Mark 19 automatic grenade launcher. Later, The Gunny gets back in his civvies to fire some old-school artillery, the 1841 12lbs Mountain Howitzer, and 50mm Krupp Mountain Gun with history buff and weapons expert, Gary Harper.

8.title: Vintage Gunny

episode of.title: GunnyTime with R. Lee Ermey (TV Series 2015– )

8.plot: The Gunny and firearms expert Mike Tristano get familiar with the hard-hitting guns of the French Foreign Legion. Later, weapons expert Gary Harper rolls by to show us his motorcycle mounted MG34. A double blast from the past.

9.title: Big & Small Brass Blasters

episode of.title: GunnyTime with R. Lee Ermey (TV Series 2015– )

9.plot: The Gunny and former Israeli Special Forces Counter Terrorism Member Aaron Cohen go out to the range, to roll through some rounds with the Uzi family of submachine guns. Later, machine gun aficionado Kenton Tucker drops by to catch up with the Gunny over a nice, not so quiet, conversation with the Lewis machine gun.

10.title: Future Counter Terrorism

episode of.title: GunnyTime with R. Lee Ermey (TV Series 2015– )

10.plot: The Gunny and Navy Seal Craig "Sawman" Sawyer go long-range with the SWORD Mk-18 - a sniper rifle that Saw helped design - plus Armasight's latest thermal / infrared night imaging. Also, the boys from Kriss USA drop by to blaze through some mags with the Kriss Vector Submachine Gun.

11.title: Mortar Mayhem

episode of.title: GunnyTime with R. Lee Ermey (TV Series 2015– )

11.plot: The Gunny pays the last visit of the season to The School of Infantry-West and Marine Corps Base Camp Pendleton. He's not going quietly either, as we bring the thunder with the earth pounding 60mm and 81mm mortars. So PAY ATTENTION, because it isn't every day you get a peak behind these walls.

1.title: Special Delivery

episode of.title: GunnyTime with R. Lee Ermey (TV Series 2015– )

1.plot: The Gunny and crew from Dillon Aero hit the skies in a Bell UH1 Iroquois "Huey," complete with a mounted Dillon Minigun. Then, former Navy Seal Craig Sawyer stops by to paint the town with another hard hitting classic: the Stoner 63.

2.title: The Terror of My Ways

episode of.title: GunnyTime with R. Lee Ermey (TV Series 2015– )

2.plot: The Gunny invites 3-time USPSA National Champion Tori Nonaka out to the range to breeze through some rounds with the Mauser M17 "Schnellfeuer" Pistol; and much more.

3.title: Targets of My Affection

episode of.title: GunnyTime with R. Lee Ermey (TV Series 2015– )

3.plot: The Gunny and Team Glock Captain Shane Coley hit the range with a Glock 19 with a new Modular Optic System to show off the recent modifications and put the pistol through its paces; and much more.

4.title: The Big Finnish

episode of.title: GunnyTime with R. Lee Ermey (TV Series 2015– )

4.plot: The Gunny and weapons expert Kenton Tucker get together to talk about the famous Finnish Lahti Anti-Tank gun and see if it's as anti-tank as it's cracked up to be; and more.

5.title: Special Weapons and Tactics: The SWAT Special

episode of.title: GunnyTime with R. Lee Ermey (TV Series 2015– )

5.plot: The Gunny makes fast friends with Captain John Kleinheinz of the Maricopa County, Arizona U.S.A. SWAT team and talks all things SWAT, from the units that make up a SWAT Team, to the inner workings of the team and much more.

6.title: SCARs and Snipes

episode of.title: GunnyTime with R. Lee Ermey (TV Series 2015– )

6.plot: The Gunny and Craig "Sawman" Sawyer take aim with the FN SCAR (Special Operations Forces Combat Assault Rifle), and they punch through a block wall to take out some rogue melons; and much more.

7.title: Nam'Ma Mia

episode of.title: GunnyTime with R. Lee Ermey (TV Series 2015– )

7.plot: The Gunny and his brother at arms Kenton Tucker take a spin in Kenton's Vietnam era MUTT Jeep, complete with a Ma Deuce between the seats, in a trip down memory lane. This is the original Vietnam Road Warrior; and much more.

8.title: The Gunny, the Bad and the Ugly

episode of.title: GunnyTime with R. Lee Ermey (TV Series 2015– )

8.plot: The Gunny and Pete Sherayko take a trip back to the old Wild West, and check out a couple of the most legendary pistols of the period, the models 1877 and 1878 Colt revolvers; and much more.

9.title: Haze Gray and Underway

episode of.title: GunnyTime with R. Lee Ermey (TV Series 2015– )

9.plot: The Gunny gets haze-gray and underway with the crew of the USS Makin Island (LHD-8) as they test some of its weapons. This Wasp Class amphibious assault ship is one of the most cutting edge ships in the United States Naval Fleet.

10.title: Makin' Us Proud

episode of.title: GunnyTime with R. Lee Ermey (TV Series 2015– )

10.plot: The Gunny is back aboard the USS Makin Island, exploring more of the ship's advanced weaponry alongside the Navy's top weapons specialists.

imdb.plot outline: GunnyTime with R. Lee Ermey is a fully immersive host-driven television series focusing on weapons and weapons technology past, present and future. The Gunny, R. Lee Ermey, will get a chance to scratch his itchy trigger-finger as he plays with some fabulous weapons and weaponized vehicles, and consults with some top-notch experts. And, as only The Gunny can do, he will show our audience the way in his famous indomitable style when it comes to the world's most fabulous weaponry.
imdb.title: GunnyTime with R. Lee Ermey
akas: GunnyTime with R. Lee Ermey (United States)

Lee Ermey, will get a chance to scratch his itchy trigger-finger as he plays with some fabulous weapons and weaponized vehicles, and consults with some top-notch experts. And, as only The Gunny can do, he will show our audience the way in his famous indomitable style when it comes to the world's most fabulous weaponry.::Outdoor Channel
